prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a jellyfish-like body and playful personality.
I want a water-type Pokemon that has a unique hat feature and a cute appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a small creature with tentacles and bright colors.
Make a dual-type Pokemon with a quirky design and a fun-loving nature.
Imagine a Pokemon with a blue body and pink accents, perfect for a whimsical environment.
Design a creature that thrives in urban areas and has both aquatic and psychic abilities.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that uses its intelligence to outsmart opponents in battles.
